text: Hecla is the traditional English spelling of the Icelandic volcano, Hekla, and may also refer to: == Places == * Fury and Hecla Strait, Nunavut, Canada * Hecla, Kentucky, USA * Hecla, Missouri, USA * Hecla, Montana, USA * Hecla Iron Works Building, Brooklyn, NY, USA * Hecla, South Dakota, USA * Hecla, Wyoming, USA, a ghost town near Laramie * Hecla and Fury Islands, Nunavut, Canada * Hecla and Griper Bay, Nunavut and Northwest Territories, Canada * Hecla- Grindstone Provincial Park, Manitoba, Canada * Hecla (South Uist), a 606 m mountain on the island of South Uist, Scotland == Ships == * Hecla-class bomb vessel * Hecla-class survey vessel * HMS Hecla, various == Other uses == * Hecla Mining, Idaho based mining company * Calumet and Hecla Mining Company, Michigan, USA ** Calumet & Hecla Band ==See also== * Hekla
title: Hecla
